radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is slightly increased in echogenicity which may reflect fatty infiltration. No focal lesions. No intrahepatic duct dilation. CBD is increased in diameter measuring 6 mm, previously 3 mm. The gallbladder contains numerous echogenic shadowing stones. Increasing wall thickening up to 4 mm but no distension and no pericholecystic fluid. Possible intramural edema.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: CBD diameter increased from 3 mm to 6 mm.
